argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` S ) = ( mulGrp ` S ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_isrhm | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) <-> ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) /\ ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simprbi | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) -> ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simpld | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) -> F e. ( R GrpHom S ) ) |
